data.name: Soulrun
data.detailed_description:
PLEASE NOTE: Game is in early development phase

All things come to an end. So did your life. By accident, while going to meet the love of your life. Mr. Death is on a playful mood today, can there be another chance?

You've been sent to the world which is between the living, and the dead. Cities and forests, which look familiar is now filled with darkness and pain. Lead your character through hazardous environments using dozends of different abilities. Time is your currency, which is reduced each second, but also used to purchase goods from the Death Shop.

Features
  • Death Shops which offer dozens of different abilities to choose from
  • Explore the beautiful lands between the dead and the living
  • Atmospheric and dark themed art style
  • Time is your currency, choose your actions wisely.
  • Fast paced platforming in hazardous levels

data.short_description: Use your controller or keyboard to race through a hazardous world between the dead and the living. All things come to an end. So did your life. By accident, while going to meet the love of your life. Mr. Death is on a playful mood today, can there be another chance?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discreet video card
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

content_descriptors.notes: Soulrun has dark themes and contains visual & audiovisual materials which some users may find disturbing and/or depressing.
